title: Brain Magnets and Joy Buckets
itunes:summary:
Do you remember what it was like when you and your spouse first fell in love? The attraction was so strong. As time goes on, that same attraction can start to fade if you're not careful. John, Greg and Erin provide some helpful thoughts on how to not lose curiosity in your spouse. Featuring Dr. Marcus Warner and Pastor Chris Coursey.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "The 4 Habits of Joy-Filled Marriages" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-08-31?refcd=1134502

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/brain-magnets-and-joy-buckets/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
